original_text: And Hezekiah was glad of them, and shewed them the house of his precious things, the silver, and the gold, and the spices, and the precious ointment, and all the house of his armour, and all that was found in his treasures: there was nothing in his house, nor in all his dominion, that Hezekiah shewed them not.
korean_text: 히스기야가 사자들로 말미암아 기뻐하여 그들에게 보물 창고 곧 은금과 향료와 보배로운 기름과 모든 무기고에 있는 것을 다 보여 주었으니 히스기야가 궁중의 소유와 전 국내의 소유를 보이지 아니한 것이 없는지라

sentences.original_text: And Hezekiah was glad of them
and shewed them the house of his precious things
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그들에게 자신의 보물이 있는 집을 보여주었다

sentences.original_text: and the spices, and the precious ointment
and all the house of his armour
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 자신의 무기가 있는 모든 집

sentences.original_text: and all that was found in his treasures
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 자신의 보물창고에서 발견된 모든 것

sentences.original_text: there was nothing in his house
